meanings.sent1: After taking a break from spicy food, my taste buds resensitized to the heat.
meanings.sent2: The doctor resensitized the patient's skin before performing the allergy test.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's superpower was to resensitize his sense of danger whenever he was in trouble.
meanings.sent4: The music resensitized her emotions, bringing back memories of happier times.
meanings.sent5: The therapy session aimed to resensitize the patient's awareness of their surroundings.

meanings.sent1: The technician resensitized the microphone to pick up even the faintest sounds.
meanings.sent2: The medication helped resensitize the patient's skin to touch after the numbness wore off.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was to resensitize the audience's sense of wonder with each performance.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brushstrokes resensitized the painting, bringing out vibrant colors once again.
meanings.sent5: The aromatherapy oils were used to resensitize the client's sense of smell during the massage.
